column2: Steel Partners Holdings LP is a holding company, which engages in owning and operating businesses and has significant interests in various industries, including diversified industrial products, energy, defense, supply chain management and logistics, banking, and youth sports. The company is headquartered in New York City, New York and currently employs 5,300 full-time employees. The firm's segments are Diversified Industrial, Energy, Financial Services, and Corporate and Other. The firm owns and operates businesses, and has investments in companies, in various industries, including diversified industrial products, energy, defense, supply chain management and logistics, banking and youth sports.
